creator: powerbookmedic
title: Macbook Pro 15 Inch Repair - LCD From Bottom Pan Removal
description: This project provides a guide on how to remove the display assembly from the bottom pan of a 15" Macbook Pro.
steps: The provided text serves as an introduction to a video guide.
The video demonstrates the process of removing the LCD from the bottom pan of a 15" Macbook Pro.
Refer to the video and any accompanying guides from PowerbookMedic for detailed disassembly instructions.
